lead_paragraph: BERENBACH--Shari Sue, 64, died peacefully at home in Bethesda, MD on February 7 of breast cancer. She dedicated her life to alleviating poverty, including serving as President of the United States African Development Foundation, Director of the Micro and Private Enterprise Promotion Office at USAID and President of the Calvert Foundation. She is survived by her husband of 23 years, Jim Heaney, daughter Moriah, brother Morley, and sister Jeanne Carl. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERENBACH, SHARI SUE

She is survived by her husband of 23 years, Jim Heaney, daughter Moriah, brother Morley, and sister Jeanne Carl. 1/3
